languages.text: {n}Мия, держащая вас на прицеле, бросает раздраженный взгляд на Нэми.{/n} "Дура, не говори с ерети{mf|ком|чкой}!"
{n}Holding you at gunpoint, Mia casts an annoyed glance at Nemi.{/n} "Don't speak with the heretic, you idiot!"
languages.original_text: {n}Мия, держащая вас на прицеле, бросает раздраженный взгляд на Нэми.{/n} "Дура, не говори с ерети{mf|ком|чкой}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Holding you at gunpoint, Mia casts an annoyed glance at Nemi.{/n} "Don't talk to the heretic, you fool!"
traits.speaker: InfernusDaughter

languages.text: {n}Sin dejar de apuntarte con su arma, Mia mira irritada a Nemi.{/n} «¡No hables con {mf|el|la} hereje, so mema!».
languages.original_text: {n}Holding you at gunpoint, Mia casts an annoyed glance at Nemi.{/n} "Don't speak with the heretic, you idiot!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin dejar de apuntarte con su arma, Mia mira irritada a Nemi.{/n} «¡No hables con {mf|el|la} hereje, so mema!».
traits.speaker: InfernusDaughter

languages.text: {n}銃を突きつけられ、ミアはネミに苛立った視線を送る。{/n}「異端者と話すんじゃない、このバカ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Holding you at gunpoint, Mia casts an annoyed glance at Nemi.{/n} "Don't speak with the heretic, you idiot!"

traits.locale_text: {n}銃を突きつけられ、ミアはネミに苛立った視線を送る。{/n}「異端者と話すんじゃない、このバカ！」
traits.speaker: InfernusDaughter

languages.text: {n}米娅用枪指着你，愤怒地瞪了涅米一眼。{/n}“不要和异端分子说话，你这个白痴！”
languages.original_text: {n}Holding you at gunpoint, Mia casts an annoyed glance at Nemi.{/n} "Don't speak with the heretic, you idiot!"

traits.locale_text: {n}米娅用枪指着你，愤怒地瞪了涅米一眼。{/n}“不要和异端分子说话，你这个白痴！”
traits.speaker: InfernusDaughter

languages.text: {n}Mia, die Waffe auf dich gerichtet, wirft Nemi einen verärgerten Blick zu.{/n} "Nicht mit {mf|dem Ketzer|der Ketzerin} sprechen, verflucht!"
languages.original_text: {n}Holding you at gunpoint, Mia casts an annoyed glance at Nemi.{/n} "Don't speak with the heretic, you idiot!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mia, die Waffe auf dich gerichtet, wirft Nemi einen verärgerten Blick zu.{/n} "Nicht mit {mf|dem Ketzer|der Ketzerin} sprechen, verflucht!"
traits.speaker: InfernusDaughter

languages.text: {n}Mia, qui vous tient en joue, lance un regard agacé à Nemi.{/n} « Ne parle pas à l'hérétique, imbécile ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Holding you at gunpoint, Mia casts an annoyed glance at Nemi.{/n} "Don't speak with the heretic, you idiot!"

languages.text: {n}Silahını sana doğrultan Mia, Nemi'ye hoşnutsuz bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Kâfirle konuşmasana salak!"
languages.original_text: {n}Holding you at gunpoint, Mia casts an annoyed glance at Nemi.{/n} "Don't speak with the heretic, you idiot!"
